item.title: Terminal colours are tricky
item.description: Yesterday I was thinking about how long it took me to get a colorscheme in my terminal that I was mostly happy with (SO MANY YEARS), and it made me wonder what about terminal colours made it so hard.

item.title: ほな、相対性理論っちゅうのを簡単に説明するで
item.description: たとえば、電車が走っとる中で懐中電灯を前に向けて光らしても、外でじっとしてる人が見た光の速さも同じやねん。 でも光の速さだけは、どんなに速く動いても変わらんのや。
